Package kademlia

Class Statistician

java.lang.Object
kademlia.Statistician
All Implemented Interfaces:
KadStatistician
public class Statistician
extends java.lang.Object
implements KadStatistician
Class that keeps statistics for this Kademlia instance. These statistics are temporary and will be lost when Kad is shut down.
Since:
20140505
